author: kamil_chodola
content:
Did anyone noticed any bigger delay of blocks receival on Holesky? Looking at Nethermind logs now and I see that it happens that some of the blocks are being received after longer than expected time (for example 14-15 seconds delay between some of the blocks which then is being catched up by another one).

It was happening before as well as I can see but feels like it is worse now (but not yet proven with metrics)
